citations.narrative:
The facility has an exercise program and adequate space for dogs; however the previously approved plan has not been
approved by the new Attending Veterinarian (AV). An exercise plan approved by the AV helps ensure that dogs are
provided with adequate space and exercise opportunities. Ensure that the written Exercise Plan for dogs is approved by
the AV.
***Correct by 4/11/2024.

The facility has not had the attending veterinarian (AV) take adult dog fecal samples (for parasite screening) as required.
Sampling for parasites with fecal samples at the schedule indicated by the AV helps determine if the current de-worming
program is working. Ensure to work with the attending veterinarian at getting dogs sampled and keep test results as
required.
***Correct by 4/11/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.8 
   
Exercise for dogs. 
The facility has an exercise program and adequate space for dogs; however the previously approved plan has not been 
approved by the new Attending Veterinarian (AV). An exercise plan approved by the AV helps ensure that dogs are 
provided with adequate space and exercise opportunities. Ensure that the written Exercise Plan for dogs is approved by 
the AV.  
***Correct by 4/11/2024. 
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has not had the attending veterinarian (AV) take adult dog fecal samples (for parasite screening) as required. 
Sampling for parasites with fecal samples at the schedule indicated by the AV helps determine if the current de-worming 
program is working. Ensure to work with the attending veterinarian at getting dogs sampled and keep test results as 
required.  
***Correct by 4/11/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
